title: Computer-assisted Argument Mapping (CAAM) Course for Critical Thinking Enhancement in Pre-service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Basic knowledge of argumentation structures and educational methodologies
context.additional_context: A course emphasizing critical thinking training and cultivating the ability to visualize argument structures for pre-service teachers to apply in real educational settings.

learning_goals: Learners can systematically represent complex social studies topics as argument maps using the CAAM tool
Learners can analyze peers' argument maps and identify logical fallacies and alternative perspectives with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can reflect on their own thinking patterns identified during argument mapping in a reflective journal and propose improvement strategies.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
